Implements actual lowering algorithms for each <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> that can be used in Rule.OperandMapping.

Similar to legalizer helper but with register banks.

<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> One = B.buildConstant(VgprRB&#95;S32, 1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Make sure to run AMDGPUGlobalISelDivergenceLowering &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We accept all types that can fit in some register class.</span></CodeLine>
